name: HeroesLeft_Prototype
description:
Welcome to the prototype of HeroesLeft, a 2D platformer action game where you can rescue the world with your own chosen team of heroes!

Movement: Currently, only the keyboard can be used. Press any button to connect your player.
Press A,D to move; Press W to look up, S to crouch, J for melee, K for Shooting, L for Blocking, I for Special (when charged), Left Shift for Sprinting, Space for Jumping.

In future versions, local multiplayer with controllers will be supported.

Known bugs:

* You can't get up again after crouching under an object
